Karma Healing and the Chakra with Dr. John Wyrick About Dr. John

John Wyrick

Dr John Wyrick is a Healer, a Sufi spiritual teacher and the founder of Nirodha Karma Healing. He has been an alternative health practitioner since 1973. He began his career as a massage therapist, acupuncturist and Chiropractor. In 1984 he discovered he could guide his clients into a deep state of meditation called Nirodha. In this deep state he was able to help people clearly identify and silence particular karma patterns (called Samscaras) held in their light body. In Nirodha, a profound change of vibration occurs; specific, difficult karmic impressions, carried in a person’s energy field, stop emanating into existence. As a result of resetting the vibrational field; deep, lasting, positive change occurs.

Dr John Wyrick’s home practice is in Acton and Watertown, Ma.

For more information http://www.nirodhakarmahealing.com/ or call Maura at 831.277.6705.

About The Class

Dr Wyrick is now teaching at the Solstice Healing Arts Center at Medway, Ma. He is presenting a 6 part twice-monthly class on how the chakras relate to the various karma patterns and how to heal them. Each person is born with a unique combination of karma patterns (the difficult ones) and dharma patterns ( gifts and life purpose). These patterns emanate from the light body which governs all the other layers of a persons energy field, Including the chakras. To change one’s chakras one must silence the karma patterns and increase the radiance in one’s energy field.

In conjunction with the seven-chakra Hindu system (which many people are already familiar with) Dr. John will teach the secret Sufi chakra system (know as the Latif system). This Sufi Latif system is remarkable for its understanding and accuracy in pinpointing where and how the karma patterns show up in all aspects of a person’s life, health and relationships. Class participants will learn to diagnose karma and dharma patterns and begin to learn how the chakras can be healed through Nirodha. This class will teach you to see yourself and others in a new way. Come and join us for this rare and fascinating exploration.
